metaTitle: Free Online Notepad - Auto-Save & Dark Mode | Online Tools
metaDescription: Free online notepad with auto-save feature, dark mode, find & replace, and word count. Your notes are stored locally in browser. 100% private and secure.

helpMenu.shortcutsText:
Keyboard shortcuts:
Ctrl+S - Save
Ctrl+Z - Undo

Ctrl+P - Print

privateSecure.title: 100% Private & Secure
privateSecure.description: Your notes are stored locally in your browser. Nothing is uploaded to any server, ensuring complete privacy and security.

autoSave.title: Auto-Save Feature
autoSave.description: Never lose your work! All changes are automatically saved to your browser's local storage in real-time.

darkMode.title: Dark Mode Support
darkMode.description: Switch between light and dark themes for comfortable writing in any lighting condition. Your preference is saved.

richText.title: Rich Text Editing
richText.description: Full editing capabilities with undo/redo, find & replace, word count, and customizable font size for optimal writing experience.

fileOps.title: Easy File Operations
fileOps.description: Open, save, and download text files. Export your notes as TXT files or share via email with just one click.

free.title: 100% Free Forever
free.description: No premium features, no subscriptions, no hidden costs. All features are completely free with unlimited usage.
